text.data-name: Cafecito is a specialty coffee shop in Buenos Aires. I worked on various projects for them, including packaging design, UX UI Design for their website, illustrations, menus, stickers, merchandising, and more. Their goal was to have a fresh, clean, and play
text.tspan: Cafecito is a specialty coffee shop in Buenos Aires. I worked on various
projects for them, including packaging design, UX UI Design for their website,
illustrations, menus, stickers, merchandising, and more. Their goal was to
have a fresh, clean, and playful brand image, and I aimed to capture that in
